name: "Dillicious" Honey Mustard Salmon Fillets
preparation: Whisk first 3 ingredients together in an 8” x 8” x 2” glass baking dish.
Add salmon and, using silicone tongs, coat with marinade. If making ahead, cover and refrigerate for up to 12 hours.
Preheat oven to 400° F (205° C). Place salmon skin side down in baking dish.
Bake 8 minutes. Flip and bake an additional 8 minutes, or until fish flakes easily with a fork.
tips: Serve with mashed potatoes and your favourite veggies.

products.name: Honey Mustard
summary: A bold twist on a classic condiment made with 100% Canadian mustard seed and organic honey.

products.name: Lemon Dilly Dip Mix
summary: Beyond being one of our most-loved kid-friendly dips – they love it for dunking chicken strips, fish bites, and veggies – Lemon Dilly is all about versatility. With loads of dill and a hint of lemon zest, it makes an utterly delicious tzatziki and spread for burgers and sandwiches, and levels up everything from salad dressing and salmon to pasta and vegetables.
